title: Tom Brady, NFL, Championships, and Wilder-Fury
itunes:title: Tom Brady, NFL, Championships, and Wilder-Fury
description:
Colin explains why it's not likely QB Tom Brady is leaving the Patriots, his thoughts on the NFL possibly going to a 17 game regular season, what teams have done to win championships, and why he is excited for the Deontay Wilder-Tyson Fury fight this weekend. Guests include Lane Johnson, Dan Woike, and Tyson Fury.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
